item.description:
Salvation has asked us to keep our RSVP's current and arrive as close to 7:30PM as possible - we have reservations for 15 - Thank you : ).

Let's Get out and Enjoy a Saturday night!
Salvation Cafe - Dinner & Drinks
November 7, 2009 - 7:30 PM.

I made a reservation under my name (Lonnie.)

What better way to enjoy a Saturday night than having food & drinks with new/old friends?

With a table reservation we should order food with drinks - drinks never a problem : ) - arrive hungry and thirsty.

Feel free to text or call me if you are running late or planning to join us later.

We can make our way down to other bars if our group feels like a Pub crawl...
item.name: Let's Get Out and Enjoy a Saturday Night - Salvation Cafe Dinner & Drinks
